__TOC__



Team meetings are organized for members to discuss plans, ideas, goals, projects, funding, problems & issues, etc. Alternatively, you may join us at any meeting through IRC in #ubuntu-us-al on the Freenode network. Our weekly team meetings occur on '''Thursday nights at 9:00pm'''.

Also: <nowiki>[[AlabamaTeam-Events|Events]]</nowiki>
